home.join_team: Join our team of business developers and shape the future of

section2a.title: About FlyPool
section2a.description: FlyPool is more than just a carpooling app. It's a community of committed travelers, an economical and sustainable solution for your trips to and from airports around the world.

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.description: Travel for free while reducing your carbon footprint. It's an eco-friendly alternative to airport transport. Each trip contributes to charitable causes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our mission is simple: make carpooling accessible to everyone, promote sustainability, and protect the environment with the support of several partner NGOs.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Drivers post their trips, and passengers find their ideal trips using our advanced search engine.

section2b.title: Your Role
section2b.descriptionu: We invite you to take a first look around and apply by filling in the form below to find out more about FLYPOOL and join our adventure...
section2b.description: At FlyPool, our ambassadors are the essential link between the FlyPool app and our community of users, partners, and local media. They play a key role as field coordinators.

left_column.title: The Main Role of Our Ambassadors:
left_column.description: You are a true link between FlyPool and local actors

left_column.title: Spokesperson for FlyPool:
left_column.description: You represent us in the local media, with professional actors, and local or national political organizations.

left_column.title: Partner Search:
left_column.description: To fuel the FlyPool store (FlyPoolâ€™s virtual shop)

right_column.title: Promote FlyPool:
right_column.description: Make the app known to local actors around the airport.

right_column.title: Donation Collection:
right_column.description: Convince donors, whether individuals or professionals, private or public, to support our organization.

right_column.title: Convince Advertisers:
right_column.description: Sell advertising spaces on the platform (banners, display, video)
